items.title: Market Today: RIL, HCL Q2, Hyundai Motor IPO, Garuda Construction listing
items.description: At 6:33 AM, GIFT Nifty Futures were trading 30 points higher at 25,251, suggesting a higher start for Indian markets.

items.title: Nifty Fin Svcs, PSU Bank rangebound; time to be cautious? What analysts say
items.description: The Nifty Financial Services Index is currently trading within a well-defined range of 23,900 to 23,100. This range-bound pattern indicates consolidation in the market

items.title: Stocks To Watch: RIL, HCLTech, L&T, Adani Power, Atul Auto, SpiceJet
items.description: Stock Market Today: RIL reported a 4.8 per cent year-on-year decline in consolidated profit for Q2 FY25, totaling Rs 16,563 crore, and missing analyst expectations.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India markets likely to open higher, signals GIFT Nifty; Nikkei up 1.6%
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading marginally ahead of Nifty futures' last close, indicated a slight upside at open for India markets on Tuesday.

items.title: Hyundai Motor India IPO opens: GMP shows slight uptick; Should you apply?
items.description: Hyundai Motor India IPO opens for public subscription from October 15, 2024, to October 17, 2024. Check here for key details: Price Band, Lot Size, GMP, Allotment Date, Listing Date, and more

items.title: Pivot point for Nifty 50 index moves higher to 25,150, suggests F&O data
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 15: In case of Bank Nifty the max pain is seen at 51,800; with the PCR rising to 1 - tilt towards a bullish bias is observed, says SAMCO Securities analyst.

items.title: Lykka Labs shares rally 7% on CDSCO nod for diabetic neuropathy pain drug
items.description: Lyka Labs shares rose as the company announced that it has received the CDSCO approval for manufacturing & marketing of of Pregabalin Gel 8% w/w for use in patients with Diabetic Neuropathic Pain.

items.title: Brokerages bullish on HCL Tech post Q2FY25 outperformance, raise EPS target
items.description: Shares of HCL Tech hit their lifetime high at Rs 1,882, rising by 1.40 per cent on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday deals after the company delivered solid performance in its quarter two results

items.title: Garuda Construction shares list at 10% premium defying IPO GMP trend
items.description: Ahead of the listing, the grey market premium for Garuda Construction's IPO turned flat, signaling a subdued debut for the company's shares

items.title: J Kumar Infra up 3% on Rs 298-cr work order from Pune Municipal Corporation
items.description: The rise in J Kumar Infra share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 297.83 crore from Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC).

items.title: Network18, TV18 rally on RIL plans to close merger with Disney India in Q3
items.description: Shares of media majors Network 18 Media and Investments and TV18 Broadcast soared up to over 9 per cent in intraday trade on Tuesday on the NSE

items.title: How to trade RIL stock post Q2 results? All eyes on this long-term MA
items.description: As traders await bonus share record date announcement; technical chart shows that Reliance stock has strong support at Rs 2,640 its 20-MMA - a key moving average the stock has held since June 2023.

items.title: Angel One soars 9% post Q2 results, Motilal Oswal Financial hits new high
items.description: Angel One reported a healthy 44 per cent year-on-year jump in its consolidated profit after tax at Rs 423.4 crore, in the September 2024 quarter.

items.title: Exxaro Tiles share rise 4% on 1:10 stock-split announcement; details here
items.description: The surge in Exxaro Tiles share price came after the company announced that its board has approved a 1:10 stock split.

items.title: Reliance results: Weak O2C, Retail biz to keep shares sideways, say experts
items.description: RIL share price: Some brokerages have also cut Reliance Industries (RIL) share price targets, factoring-in the sluggishness seen in oil-to-chemical (O2C) and retail verticals

items.title: VA Tech Wabag hits record high after receiving order worth Rs 1,000 cr
items.description: Shares of VA Tech Wabag reached their all time high at Rs 1,743.85 a piece on the BSE, rising 4.3 per cent in Tuesday's intraday deals

items.title: This stock has zoomed 900% over its issue price in less than 2 years
items.description: Kaynes Technology share price hit a record high of Rs 5,876.60, up 3% on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade. Kaynes shares have zoomed 125% in the past five months on a healthy business outlook

items.title: Axis Bank Q2 results preview: Analysts see modest profit growth, weak NIM
items.description: Axis Bank Q2 results: Domestic brokerage Motilal Oswal Financial estimates Axis Bank's Q2 profit after tax at Rs 6,630 crore, up 13 per cent Y-o-Y

items.title: Rs 142-crore order win boosts TD Power Systems share price by 6%
items.description: TD Power Systems share price jumped after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 142 crore from two major international gas engine Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs)

items.title: Wipro Q2FY25 preview: Revenue may fall up to 3% YoY; margin, guidance eyed
items.description: Overall, the sentiment remains cautiously optimistic for Wipro ahead of results, with key focus areas including large-deal pipelines and consulting growth.

items.title: SpiceJet up 3% on settling $23 mn dispute with Aircastle & Wilmington Trust
items.description: The spike in SpiceJet share price came after the company announced that it has settled a $23.39 million dispute with Aircastle (Ireland) & Wilmington Trust SP Services (Dublin) Limited for $5 million

items.title: Ola Electric share price up 5% as it consolidates 34% market share in Oct
items.description: Ola Electric has achieved 34 per cent market share on the back of its wide S1 portfolio of scooters and an expanding service network, even as its after-sales and pricing practices come under radar

items.title: IFGL Refractories surges over 5% on plans to set up greenfield facility
items.description: Shares of IFGL Refractories soared up to 5.5 per cent at Rs 624.90 per share on the NSE

items.title: Infosys Q2 Preview: Co to lead Tier-I IT pack; profits may grow over 9% YoY
items.description: Analysts expect Infosys to log strong performance among its Tier-I IT peers, driven by large deal ramp-ups, integration of its subsidiary 'intech', and recovery in the banking and financial services

items.title: Ramkrishna Forgings up 3%; hits life high as UBS initiates with 'Buy' call
items.description: UBS reckons that the consensus has not fully factored in growth drivers such as higher penetration in EV and aluminium forging, rising contributions from acquisitions and new business in earth moving

items.title: Nestle Q2 preview: Profit may rise up to 8% YoY, revenue 5-7%, say analysts
items.description: Nestle India Q2 results preview: Investors will monitor the demand outlook on rural against urban, competitive intensity and raw material trends for Nestle India

items.title: Waaree Energies IPO: 5 key things to know from RHP before bidding starts
items.description: Having secured 'in-principle' approvals from the BSE, and National Stock Exchange (NSE) for the listing of its equity shares, Waaree Energies is all set for its market debut

items.title: Here's why Bajaj Auto shares fell over 3% on Oct 15; check details here
items.description: Shares of Bajaj Auto fell as much 3.51 per cent at Rs 11,475 per share on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade

items.title: HDFC AMC hits record high, rallies 11% in 6 days; m-cap nears Rs 1 trillion
items.description: At 12:04 PM, HDFC AMC shares were trading 1.8 per cent higher at Rs 4,562. HDFC AMC market cap (m-cap) stood at Rs 97,452 crore

items.title: Hyundai Motor India IPO Off to slow start: 0.11x subscription, GMP falls 1%
items.description: Notably, Hyundai Motor India's IPO marks the first time in two decades that a carmaker has gone public in India, following Maruti Suzuki's listing in 2003

items.title: HPCL, BPCL, IOC soar up to 5% in trade as oil prices slip to 2-week low
items.description: A fall in oil prices is beneficial to OMCs as their costs for acquiring crude oil for refining drop

items.title: Voda Idea, Dabur, YES Bank trade in oversold zone on NSE; key levels here
items.description: The 14-day RSI of Voda Idea, Bank of India, Dabur, YES Bank and DMart stands below 30, indicating oversold condition on the daily chart. In case of a pullback, these stocks can bounce back up to 24%.

items.title: Microcap stock soars 20% on 1:5 stock split news; up 60% in 4 days
items.description: Premier Polyfilm Ltd stock split news: Premier Polyfilm shares were locked in the upper circuit for a second straight day on the BSE today

items.title: RPP Infra up 5% as it bags Rs 217-cr road improvement work order in Jalgon
items.description: RPP Infra's road improvement project in Jalgon, Maharashtra, has to be completed within two years. With this order, the company's order book stands at Rs 3,523.24 crore as of October 15, 2024

items.title: Gopal Snacks shares fall over 4% on weak margin, higher expenses
items.description: The drop in the share price came after the company's expenses jumped 13.1 per cent year-on-year (Y-o-Y) to Rs 3,649.9 crore in Q2FY25, from Rs 3,227.88 crore in Q2FY24

items.title: Kiri Industries board approves warrants worth Rs 492-cr; shares gain 4%
items.description: Earlier, on October 14, Kiri Industries had said in a regulatory filing that the Company has received In-Principle approval from both the Stock Exchanges i.e., BSE and NSE

items.title: Transformers & Rectifiers hits 5% upper circuit in weak market; check why
items.description: Various funds bought stakes in Transformers & Rectifiers after promoter Jitendra Mamtora sold 2.7 million shares

items.title: Ashish Kacholia Portfolio: Garware group stock zooms 153% in 5 months
items.description: Shares of Garware Hi-Tech Films hit a new high of Rs 4,211.05, rallied nearly 8 per cent on the BSE in Tuesday's intra-day trade in an otherwise weak market on expectation of strong earnings.

items.title: Paras Defence secures arms licence from Govt; Share price jumps 5%
items.description: The company has been granted a licence under the Arms Act, 1959, by the Department for Promotion of Industry & Internal Trade, Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Government of India

items.title: MCX launches cotton seed wash oil futures, offers cash-settled contracts
items.description: Each contract will have a trading unit of 5 tonne with a base value quoted in Rupee per 10 kg at Ex-Tank Kadi, Gujarat, MCX said in a statement

items.title: Sebi raises overall position limits for trading members in F&O segment
items.description: The position limits will be applicable for index futures and index options separately as it is the current practice, Sebi said

items.title: Hyundai IPO subscribed 18% on Day 1; LIC MF reduces minimum SIP limits
items.description: Shares of Garuda Construction and Engineering ended with a 12.5 per cent gain on Tuesday

items.title: IndiGo secures market regulator Sebi nod to launch venture capital fund
items.description: The fund will also look to invest in consumer startups that have a touchpoint in the passenger journey, such as travel, lifestyle, hospitality, and transportation

items.title: Sentiment positive for OMCs on lower oil prices, marketing margins
items.description: The volatile geo-political situation should lead to some caution for investors. But given the weakness in global and China demand, these trends could persist

items.title: Govt to sell up to 5% stake worth Rs 2,026 crore in Cochin Shipyard
items.description: The floor price for the sale is 1,540 rupees, an 8% discount to the stock's Tuesday close, the filing showed. At this price, the stake is valued at Rs 2,026 crore ($241.2 million)
